effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon ignores []{type:ghost}-type Pokémon's immunity to []{type:normal}- and []{type:fighting}-type moves.

Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lets the Pokémon's []{type:normal} and []{type:fighting} moves hit []{type:ghost} Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
ゴーストタイプに
ノーマル技が　当たる。

Makes Normal- and Fighting-type
moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

I Pokémon di tipo Spettro sono
colpiti da mosse Normale e Lotta.

Movimientos tipo Normal y Lucha
golpean a Pokémon Fantasma.

Normal- und Kampf-Attacken
treffen Pokémon vom Typ Geist.

Les capacités Normal et Combat
touchent les Pokémon Spectre.

ゴーストタイプに
ノーマルわざが　あたる。

Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type Pokémon.

Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type Pokémon.

Les cap. Normal touchent
les Pokémon Spectre.

Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type foes.

Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type foes.

Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type foes.
